ðŸ“– Summary: YouTubeTLDR is a lightweight, self-hosted tool for summarizing YouTube videos using the Gemini AI model. It offers customizable prompts, model selection, transcript viewing, and local storage of summaries. The application is designed for personal use, emphasizing privacy and minimal overhead, and is distributed as a single, small binary.
